Add regular expression operator

Source: R/initRegExp.R
initRegExp.Rd

Forwarded to initExtension(db, "regexp") .

Usage

initRegExp(db)

Arguments

db

A SQLiteConnection object to add the regular expression operator into the connection.

Value

Always TRUE, invisibly.

On this page
